column1: 43534808$Token Collector$Unlimited$EARTH$[Fiend/Effect]$$$$$4$0$2000$$$$If a Token is Special Summoned (except during the Damage Step): You can Special Summon this card from the GY (if it was there when the Token was Special Summoned) or hand (even if not).
